readable.title: 2848977044_446a31d86e
readable.content: A cowboy is hanging upside down from a horse . A man at the rodeo is riding his horse while upside down and not on the saddle A man is riding upside down on the side of a horse at a rodeo . A rodeo rider being thrown headfirst from a horse . A rodeo rider doing a vertical trick on a brown horse as an audience looks on .
